sent.orig: Also take a look at the feedback I have received from buyers.
sent.trans: Also在完成海关手续货物采取适当的在我从买家的反馈看。

sent.orig: I once, also similar to today, also met the pain, also has cried?
sent.trans: 我曾经是不是，也如同今天这般，也会痛，也哭过？

sent.orig: The ground also was cut, autumn also closed, grain sells quickly also.
sent.trans: 地也割了，秋也收了，粮也快卖完了。

sent.orig: Also focused on training, also the good things together, also government investment funds.
sent.trans: 也集中训练，也是把好的东西集中起来，也是政府投入经费。

sent.orig: Torny: vietnam is also trouble makers,and is also dangerous tobe to cambodia.
sent.trans: 越南也是个麻烦制造者，也对柬普塞来说，是个危险的恶棍。
